dialogue.name: Xi Jinping
dialogue.text: That's "Supreme Emperor Jinping" to you, foolish American!

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: I'm not actually an American but we're splitting hairs. I had a question I needed to ask you.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: One of my employees was killed the other day. But up until his death he's been experiencing a high fever and coughing.

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: I also found this photo at his desk 2 days before his death.

dialogue.name: Xi Jinping
dialogue.text: Speak to anyone about this and you're dead.

accusation.name: Xi Jinping
accusation.text: Of course I contaminated Dr. Bob's food with the coronavirus!

accusation.name: Xi Jinping
accusation.text: I just didn't think you'd figure it out.

accusation.name: Xi Jinping
accusation.text: But you'll be getting a taste of the virus soon... just you wait....
